name.description: The name of the configuration, for use within k2 configurations.

kind.description: The type of configuration this object it.

provider.description: The name of the provider for this provider setting.

type.description: Type of machine image deployment. For AWS, only cloudinit is supported.

networkTopology.description: Type of network topology to create, care must be taken as you need pairs of subnets in a private topology.

resourcePrefix.description: Any prefix that should be prepended to resources in AWS to make them easier to identify.

vpc.description: CIDR for the VPC for the cluster.

region.description: Region to create resources in (us-east-1, us-west-2, etc.).

subnet.description: List of subnets to use within a region for the cluster.  Should be omitted and will be ignored if existing_vpc hash is specified.

egressAcl.description: List of egress ACLs to create for the VPC.

ingressAcl.description: List of ingress ACLs to create for the VPC.

ingressSecurity.description: List of ingress security rules to create for the VPC.  This section is ignored when modifying an existing cluster.

egressSecurity.description: List of egress security rules to create for the VPC.  This section is ignored when modifying an existing cluster.
